Father.
I have returned from exile to set us free. All of us, Father- And to reclaim what has been taken from our people. The land and the freedom that is rightfully ours.
A shameful truce, worth nothing. How can you abide it? How- ? They have no respect for themselves, their Gods or the earth-
And they scorn us- every time they raise a dead, cold building, destroy a forest, or take more land-
Honor-?
Look at this place. Is this where you hold court??

.we'll need the help of the Good... the Bad... and the Worst-
Yes. I am.

- and you, too, my sister. Meanwhile, here's a taste of what lies in store.

Your weapon of choice?

Maybe this will help you remember who we are, who you are... What our destiny is-
They - they - will be mine to command, whether you like it or not. Only after our victory will you appreciate my sacrifice... and yours.
As a boy, they say I enjoyed toy soldiers. So do you, I see.
You're bleeding. Most unfortunate.
Do you envy these contraptions? They never bleed. They feel nothing. Not even the zest of combat.
These fighting men are the very model of patience... merely awaiting word from their lawful commander.
You have the remaining piece, I presume.
Then you are most foolish.

Yrdrig!!

Give me your hand.

Out! Out! Bad Yrdrig!
My name is Princess Nuala.
May I apologize, Mr. Sapien, for the manner in which we brought you here...
And under diplomatic immunity - may I seek asylum??
And that was my royal guard.
Where did you get this?
In ancient times a seal like this was delivered to the enemy as a declaration of war. A signal from the underground realm to the entire world. It prefaced the awakening of the Golden Army-
Not a tale- At the dawn of time... Even before the great flood, man and the Children of the Earth shared this planet...
But as man in his greed expanded his dominion, there ensued a bitter war...
It was then that the King ordered the Sigri to build him a new, invincible army.
This was an army that would not eat, drink or grow tired. A heartless, ruthless force made of the purest metal, mined from the depths of the earth.
The Sigri worked until the winter moon was high in the sky -
But this army knew no bounds, had no remorse, felt no loyalty, engaging in blind battle with man, woman or child.
And the golden army was ordered to lie dormant, locked inside the earth itself -
My father had it destroyed. Cut into three pieces. One for mankind...
.Two for the sons of the Earth.
I'm afraid it's the other way around.

But nothing else-
So far, this is a family matter. To intervene will bring nothing but trouble.

"I sometimes have a queer feeling -

We are twins. Even now, I can sense his presence. This has been our way since we were young children, in Renvyle-
A magical place in the West. A different time. Long gone. Now, he's near and he's looking for me. I can feel and even understand his. hatred for mankind.
You were very brave, vouching for me. How do you know I'm not the enemy, bringing me here?
